question:
Your car insurance company has told you that they are going to increase the amount you have to pay in insurance for your car each month. You are not happy about this.
Write a letter to your insurance company. In your letter explain

Why you are writing to them
Why you think the insurance should not be increased
What you want them to do
text: I am writing this letter to you to draw your attention to the recent decision about changing your insurance fees which definitely has a lot of impact on my life quality.

As you know, due to some reasons which most important of them is facing with corona pandemic the costs of all goods and services have a significant increase. So most people are in undesirable conditions. Therefore, increasing your fee creates a bad situation for all citizens.

I think, all insurance companies must create new conditions for their customer, for example, they can consider fewer insurance fees for drivers who safe drive, and also, more charges for high-risk drivers. In addition, maybe can the cost of insurance divided into more installments. Finally, I have the expectation of you give me a good discount or consider my insurance fee to accord last year because I was a good driver and did not have an accident.
Thank you for taking your time and your consideration of my letter. I looking forward to hearing about my concern.

error_list.error_des: The spelling of installments is a non-British variant. For consistency, consider replacing it with the British English spelling.
